ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that Velketor the Sorcerer has 500k,  ick Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that Velketor the Sorcerer has 500k, ick

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 1:12 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
>
>
> I heard that the Dragon in Skyshrine has 400K HP's
>
> Slyde
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 2:41 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
>
> Well honestly, the nerfs to Donals are NOT justified, in my
> opinion, because
> they have stated that many of the Velious mobs were designed
> with those BPs
> in mind. They hit for ungodly amounts and quickly and have
> insane amouts of
> HP themselves like 200k. If they downscale these mobs then
> maybe I would
> support the nerf but if not, well the increase in CR time
> alone will begin
> to make the game unpalatable to me. But then I'm in a bad
> mood today :P
>
> Halana/Tani
>
